headline: Ford Motor (F) Valuation Check After Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: How Ford Motor (F) Has Been Trading Recently Ford Motor (F) has been moving without a specific headline catalyst, so the focus for investors is on how the share price and fundamentals line up after recent trading performance. The stock closed at $13.28, with a 1-day return of a 2.35% decline, a 7-day move of a 5.01% decline, and a 1-month return of a 1.41% decline, while the past 3 months show a 6.84% gain.
